@NYGovCuomo Governor Cuomo, 781 positive COVID cases from yesterday’s Testing in New York are thousands of contact cases to be traced now to reduce community spread. Of those 781 + cases how many participated in #ReopenAmericanow and #JusticeforGeorgesFloyd protests?
